definition[0]: the quality of being honest and strong about what you believe to be right
example[0]: a man of great moral integrity
definition[1]: the state of being united as one complete thing
example[1]: the territorial integrity of the country
definition[2]: the state of being united or kept together as one whole and strong unit
example[2]: He believes that such a move could be detrimental to the financial integrity of the firm.
example[3]: A major difficulty was how to protect the integrity of the welfare and pension funds.
example[4]: Regulators questioned the good character and integrity of certain company officials.
